Application.Utils

Class TranslationUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • Application.Utils.TranslationUtil

  • @Component
public class TranslationUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class used to translate terms for the photo collage of a new Vision.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Corti Lorenzo, Tocchetti Andrea

      • translateKey

        @Value(value="${gcptranslate.key}")
private java.lang.String translateKey
        Google Cloud Translation API key. Loaded from the application properties.

      • modelType

        private java.lang.String modelType
        Model type query-string parameter for Cloud Translate API. Available models are:
        • base - NO LONGER SUPPORTED AFTER AUGUST 2021
        • nmt

    • Method Detail

      • translate

        public java.lang.String translate(java.lang.String word)
                           throws TranslateException
        Returns the English translation of a string.
        Parameters:
        word - String representing the word to translate.
        Returns:
        The English translation of a string.
        Throws:
        TranslateException - TranslateException, exception when trying to use Cloud Translation API.

      • detectLanguage

        private java.lang.String detectLanguage(java.lang.String word)
                                 throws TranslateException
        Detect the language of a word.
        Parameters:
        word - String with the text token to detect language for.
        Returns:
        The detected language code.
        Throws:
        TranslateException - TranslateException, exception when trying to use Cloud Translation API.
